      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addFighter​(Character c)
      Adds the specified character to the fighters array.
      void addHouse​(java.lang.String name, House h)
      Adds the specified house to the map of houses.
      void addReplacements​(MagicWand W)
      adds a new wand to the replacements list.
      boolean checkWinnerHouse()
      Returns true if there's only one house with characters left in the map of houses, false otherwise.
      void display​(Character c1, Character c2)
      Displays the name of the two characters that are going to fight.
      void displayC()
      Displays the name, energyPoints, offensivePoints, defensivePoints of the characters in the ArrayList of fighters and the name and the type of the wand that they have.
      void displayCR​(Character c)
      Displays the name, energyPoints, offensivePoints, defensivePoints of the character specified by parameter and the name and the type of the wand that they have and the place where the character goes.
      void displayD​(int turns)
      Displays the turn and the method displayC.
      void displayDungeon()
      Displays the name, energyPoints, offensivePoints, defensivePoints and the name and the type of the wand of all the characters in the dungeon.
      void displayEndAndDungeon()
      Displays the methods displayHouseAndCharacters, displayReplacements and displayDungeon in the format specified for the project.
      void displayHouseAndCharacters()
      Displays houses: ------ The name of the house and then displays the method displayCHouse.
      void displayR()
      Displays duel results: ------------ It is shown in the format specified for the project.
      void displayReplacements()
      Displays the name and the type of all the wands stored in the replacements ArrayList.
      void displayWinner​(House CurrentWinnerHouse)
      Displays the name of the house that has win the duel and the method displayCHouse.
      void Duel​(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      The method iterates inside the Fighters and makes each wizard fight with the other wizards on by one if their energy points are higher than 0.
      void game()
      the method simulates a real battle between wizards,firstly preparing the character from each house in the HashMap,secondly, making the fight, thirdly giving them a replacement wand(if they were not defeated) and lastly sending then to their house or to the dungeon.
      MagicWand getAndRemoveReplacement()
      the method returns and removes the MagicWand in the position 0 in the ArrayList of wand replacements.
      static Hogwarts getInstance()
      This method allows to create a single instance of the class Hogwarts.
      int getNumberOfWands()
      return the number of wands in the replacement list.
      java.util.ArrayList getReplacementList()
      returns the list of wand replacements.
      void prepareFighters()
      Iterates over the HashMap of houses taking the first wizards from each house and adding then to the array of Fighters and then sort it by lower to higher energy.
      void print​(Character c1, Character c2, java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Displays the name of the two characters that are going to fight.
      void printC​(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Prints the name, energyPoints, offensivePoints, defensivePoints of the characters in the ArrayList of fighters and the name and the type of the wand that they have.

      Prints the turn and the method printC.
      void printDungeon​(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Prints the name, energyPoints, offensivePoints, defensivePoints and the name and the type of the wand of all the characters in the dungeon.
      void printEndAndDungeon​(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Prints the methods printHouseAndCharacters, printReplacements and printDungeon in the format specified for the project.

      Prints houses: ------ The name of the house and then prints the method printCHouse.
      void printR​(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Prints duel results: ------------ It is shown in the format specified for the project.
      void printReplacements​(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Prints the name and the type of all the wands stored in the replacements ArrayList.
      void printWinner​(House CurrentWinnerHouse, java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Prints the name of the house that has win the duel and the method printCHouse.
      void returnCharacters()
      The method iterates over the Array of Fighters and checks if the character should be sent to the dungeon if the energy points are below 0, or otherwise sent to its house
      void returnToHouse​(Character Ch)
      Removes the first character of the array of wizards in the house and inserts it again so the caracter is now in the last positión
      void sendToTheDungeon​(Character c)
      Iterates over the map of houses looking for the specified character, removes it from its house and then is added to the dungeon set.

      • sendToTheDungeon

        public void sendToTheDungeon​(Character c)
        Iterates over the map of houses looking for the specified character, removes it from its house and then is added to the dungeon set.
        Parameters:
        character - to be removed from its house and added to the dungeon Linkedhashset.

      • addFighter

        Adds the specified character to the fighters array.
        Parameters:

      • prepareFighters

        public void prepareFighters()
        Iterates over the HashMap of houses taking the first wizards from each house and adding then to the array of Fighters and then sort it by lower to higher energy.

      • returnToHouse

        public void returnToHouse​(Character Ch)
        Removes the first character of the array of wizards in the house and inserts it again so the caracter is now in the last positión
        Parameters:
        character - to be removed from its house and added to that house again for the character to be in the last position of the array of wizards in that house.

      • game

        public void game()
        the method simulates a real battle between wizards,firstly preparing the character from each house in the HashMap,secondly, making the fight, thirdly giving them a replacement wand(if they were not defeated) and lastly sending then to their house or to the dungeon. then when the turn 10 finished the method will check the winner house following the criteria stated on the documentation.
